img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game, depicting a character in a snowy environment. The character is holding a spear and appears to be wearing primitive clothing, including a fur cloak and leg wraps. The setting includes snow-covered ground and bare trees, with a red brick wall in the background. A red dashed circle highlights a small glowing object in the distance, possibly indicating an item or point of interest. The game's user interface shows various icons and meters, including health and stamina bars in the bottom left corner, and a display of "Will" with a value of +6 and a multiplier of x31 on the right side.
